Plot: Welcome to New York City’s Upper East Side, where my friends and I live, go to school, play, and sleep—sometimes with each other. S is back from boarding school, and if we aren’t careful, she’s going to win over our teachers, wear that dress we couldn’t fit into, steal our boyfriends’ hearts, and basically ruin our lives in a major way. I’ll be watching closely . . . You know you love me, gossip girl
Characters: Serena van der Woodsen, Blair Waldorf, Nate Archibald, Charles "Chuck" Bass, Dan Humphrey, Jenny Humphrey, Vanessa Abrams
Setting: New York City, New York (United States)
